This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    871755002 Vaccine product containing only Salmonella enterica subspecies enterica serovar Typhi capsular polysaccharide Vi antigen (medicinal product)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-11
    CodeDisplay
    XM8BU8Typhoid vaccines
